channel.title: An Update
channel.description:
Well, it's been a while since any of you have heard an update on #64 (Jake McCullum). For those of you who don't know, Jake McCullum was a 13 year old kid, with a best friend of a dirtbike. He was racing his 85 when he fell off. He went up a jump and was kicked sideways. Onto his head. Fracturing 3 vertebrates in his neck. He is now fighting for his future of walking, and whether or not he will be deemed a paraplegic.
So, here's the update. So far Jake has made extreme progress over the last 4 weeks. He is able to twitch his right foot, and nearly turn his left ankle to 90 degrees. He has full movement in his arms. Docter's say he will walk again. Jake says he can't wait to be back on his bike an racing with his fellow motocrossers.

item.title: An Update
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Well, it’s been a while since any of you have heard an update on #64 (Jake McCullum).
For those of you who don’t know, Jake McCullum was a 13 year old kid, with a best friend of a dirtbike. He was racing his 85 when he fell off. He went up a jump and was kicked sideways. Onto his head. Fracturing 3 vertebrates in his neck. He is now fighting for his future of walking, and whether or not he will be deemed a paraplegic.

So, here’s the update.
So far Jake has made extreme progress over the last 4 weeks. He is able to twitch his right foot, and nearly turn his left ankle to 90 degrees.
He has full movement in his arms. Docter’s say he will walk again.
Jake says he can’t wait to be back on his bike an racing with his fellow motocrossers.
